translations.source: 安全管理是生产的第一要务。
translations.target: Safety management is the foremost priority in production.

translations.source: 设备维护延长设备使用寿命。
translations.target: Equipment maintenance extends the service life of equipment.

translations.source: 交接班制度保证生产连续性。
translations.target: A shift handover system ensures continuity of production.

translations.source: 消防系统保障工厂安全。
translations.target: Fire protection systems safeguard plant safety.

translations.source: 性能考核验证设计指标。
translations.target: Performance testing verifies the design specifications.
